item.title: Empathy and Trauma
item.author: Joe Kaufeld
item.description: In volunteering at a children’s hospital, there are lots of things I’ve never thought about before. These are some of them.

item.title: Intro to 3D Printing, Part 4
item.author: Joe Kaufeld
item.description: In the last post in Intro to 3D Printing, we cover cleaning up, maintenance, and processing your prints!

item.title: Intro to 3D Printing, Part 3
item.author: Joe Kaufeld
item.description: It’s part three! Parts of the printer, tools you’ll need, and considerations for your workspace are covered here.

item.title: Intro to 3D Printing, Part 2
item.author: Joe Kaufeld
item.description: In part two, we talk about things you need to plan for before getting your first printer and important questions about safety!

item.title: Intro to 3D Printing, Part 1
item.author: Joe Kaufeld
item.description: Are you a beginner looking for more information on 3D printing? This four-part introductory series answers all kinds of questions from ‘what is filament’ all the way to tools you’ll need!
